item.title: Time-Series Correlation and Regression
item.description: This post will showcase a subset of Pandas’ time-series modeling capabilities. I’ll be using financial data to demonstrate the capabilities, however, the functions can be applied to any time-series data (application logs, netflow, bio-metrics, etc). The focus will be on moving or sliding window methods. These dynamic models account for time-dependent changes for any given state in a system whereas steady-state or static models are time-invariant as they naively calculate the system in equilibrium.
